content:
<rule id="security-03600" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <!-- Spring component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-security-core" groupId="org.springframework.security"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring Boot component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-security" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring component in compiled application condition -->
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-security-core" groupId="org.springframework.security"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Security">
                    <message>
                        The application embeds a Spring Security library. Ensure that the application is configured to access the identity provider.

                        Consider using Azure Active Directory as an identity provider.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/developer/java/migration/migrate-spring-boot-to-app-service#identity-providers" title="Spring Security-related dependencies found in the project"/>
                    <link href="https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/external-identities/azure-ad-account" title="Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) identity provider for External Identities"/>
                    <link href="https://docs.spring.io/spring-security/reference/index.html" title="Spring Security"/>
                    <link href="https://auth0.com/docs/quickstart/backend/java-spring-security5/01-authorization" title="Spring Boot API: Authorization"/>
                </hint>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Security</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
